attributes.title: AVOID THIS APP
attributes.review: This app was SUPPOSED to send campaign messages but instead now I am getting viruses constantly texted and called to my PHONE! Every call I get is someone trying to sell me something that doesn’t even deal with Trump. This app is sending viruses DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!

attributes.title: This app took forever to download 😡😡😡
attributes.review: This app took almost a whole day to download and it didn’t even work 😤😤😤😤 honestly how do you expect me to respect the president when his own app doesn’t even work??? I am VERY disappointed

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review:
This app literally might be the worst app ever every page takes forever to load and everything it shows me is full of a bunch of racist dumb people. This app literally doesn’t even work

✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽✊🏼✊🏻

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 🐝
attributes.review:
According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway. Because bees don’t care what humans think is impossible.”
 -Barry Bee Benson 👁👄👁✨ Thanks for coming to my TED talk

attributes.title: Literally the worst app EVER
attributes.review: This took up SO much storage and it took so long to download 😡 but I downloaded this app so that I can support our favorite orange president coz he loves this country so much and I love all of his policies 🤪✌️ Donald Trump is the literally the BEST president ever and I support him with so much 🥺 TRUMP 2020 😤😫

attributes.title: weird stuff happening
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of gaining insight into what the campaign and Trump is all about, but good God nothing makes sense! like honestly what is coming out of this man's mouth? I would say mind, but clearly he is not capable of logical thought.

attributes.title: DO NOT BOTHER.
attributes.review: this is by far the worst app i think anybody could even fathom. don’t waste your time with this app. it’s buggy and it causes my phone to slow down significantly while the application is open. 🧿

attributes.title: This is HORRIBLE!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, it took so long to completely downloads. This caused me to have viruses on my phone. I won’t recommend this to any friends because of the results it has given me.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD😡
attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE first it took forever to download and then it kept spreading false information saying that if you drink fabulouso that your hair would turn blonde, i do not recommend downloading it should be deleted permanently from the app store!!!!!😡😡😡

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: It had SOOO many bugs and it was REALLY bad it lept asling me for personal info and the ads were really innapropriate. Also the dusty big fat orange cheeto called me just to say that he beats his wife😂i think it was a robo call... Also the gross cheetos poor choices and decisions made me realize that BLM❤️
